issues.title: Insurance Coverage and Patient Balance Discrepancy
issues.message: Despite an approved pre-authorization for ₹500,000, the insurance has reportedly covered ₹0.00 of the ₹400,000 hospital bill. However, the patient's balance is stated as ₹350,000, which is ₹50,000 less than the total bill if insurance covered nothing. This indicates a significant discrepancy in financial reporting or unstated adjustments/patient responsibility, preventing a clear financial discharge.
issues.suggested_action: Urgently investigate the financial details. Clarify why the approved pre-authorization amount has not been applied to the bill. Determine the source of the ₹50,000 reduction from the total bill to the patient's balance. Verify all deductibles, co-pays, and the current claim processing status with Red Insurance.
evidence: Pre-authorization approved for ₹500,000, Total Hospital Bill ₹400,000, Amount Covered by Insurance ₹0.00, Patient's Balance ₹350,000.

issues.title: Medication Order Pending Dispense
issues.message: The medication 'Jondise' has a pending pharmacy order (RX-002) and has not been dispensed. This medication is critical for the patient's ongoing care.
issues.suggested_action: Contact pharmacy immediately to expedite dispensing of Jondise (Ursodeoxycholic Acid).

issues.title: New Discharge Medication Not Ordered/Dispensed
issues.message: The new discharge medication 'Insulin Glargine' is listed in discharge prescriptions but has no corresponding entry in the pharmacy order status, indicating it has not been ordered or dispensed.
issues.suggested_action: Verify if Insulin Glargine was ordered. If not, place an urgent order and ensure dispensing before discharge. Confirm dosage and frequency with the prescribing physician.

issues.title: Potential Medication-Allergy Conflict
issues.message: Patient has a 'Liver complaint' allergy. 'Dolo-Crosine' (generic: Acetaminophen Extended) is known to be hepatotoxic and should be used with caution or an alternative considered in patients with pre-existing liver issues. Review appropriateness with prescribing physician.
issues.suggested_action: Consult with the prescribing physician to re-evaluate Dolo-Crosine given the patient's liver complaint. Consider alternative analgesics or dose adjustment, or confirm the benefit outweighs the risk.

issues.title: Discharge Medication Payments Pending
issues.message: Payment status for all discharge medications (Dolo-Crosine, Jondise, Insulin Glargine) is pending. Medications cannot be released until payment is cleared.
issues.suggested_action: Coordinate with patient/billing department to clear payments for all discharge medications prior to release.

issues.title: Ambulance Transport Required
issues.message: Patient diagnosed with Liver Cancer and existing condition of Excess Panting requires ALS ambulance transport for medical supervision and monitoring. A suitable provider, City Emergency Ambulance (AMB-001), is available with an estimated ETA of 60 minutes.
issues.suggested_action: Proceed with booking ALS ambulance transport with City Emergency Ambulance (AMB-001).

issues.title: Final Invoice Not Generated
issues.message: The final invoice for patient P00231 (account ACC-00231-2024) has not yet been generated. A final invoice is a critical prerequisite for patient discharge.
issues.suggested_action: Generate the final invoice for patient P00231. Ensure all charges are finalized and accurately reflected before proceeding with discharge.

issues.title: Pending Billing Adjustments
issues.message: There are pending billing adjustments, including insurance pre-authorization and unfinalized procedure billing, which could alter the final patient responsibility or lead to future billing disputes.
issues.suggested_action: Expedite the approval of insurance pre-authorization and finalize all pending procedure billings before discharge to ensure the final bill is accurate and complete.

issues.title: Critical value for RBC in Complete Blood Count
issues.message: The 'RBC' component of the 'Complete Blood Count' test has a critical value of 2.8 10^6/uL. Reference range: 4.5-5.9.
issues.suggested_action: Review critical lab results with a physician immediately and determine appropriate medical intervention or re-testing.

issues.title: Critical value for Platelets in Complete Blood Count
issues.message: The 'Platelets' component of the 'Complete Blood Count' test has a critical value of 960 10^3/uL. Reference range: 150-400.
issues.suggested_action: Review critical lab results with a physician immediately and determine appropriate medical intervention or re-testing.

issues.title: Critical value for Hemoglobin in Complete Blood Count
issues.message: The 'Hemoglobin' component of the 'Complete Blood Count' test has a critical value of 8.2 g/dL. Reference range: 13.5-17.5.
issues.suggested_action: Review critical lab results with a physician immediately and determine appropriate medical intervention or re-testing.

issues.title: Chest X-Ray is pending
issues.message: Required test 'Chest X-Ray' has not been completed. Status: pending.
issues.suggested_action: Ensure 'Chest X-Ray' is completed and results are available before discharge.
